title: Junior Software Engineer
jobSummary: NextSilicon is looking for a talented software engineer to develop the company’s key product. In this role you will work in multiple layers of the SW stack including toolchain, driver, and runtime algorithms. Overall, you will expand your scope of software knowledge beyond a single domain and gain experience with low-level SW as well as applications, frameworks, and optimization.

responsibilities.ul: Participate in the development of the company's SW stack, focusing on one or multiple domains, from definition to unit-level testing
Design SW from scratch using knowledge from multiple disciplines and languages
Implement end-to-end features in multiple SW layers

keyQualifications.ul: A genuine passion for fixing software and hardware issues
Demonstrated creative and critical thinking capabilities
Previous experience with reversing, compilers, kernel, OS drivers, and ARM/x86 assembly languages is an advantage
Bachelor’s or Master’s degree, and/or equivalent experience in computer science or a related field is preferred
